img_above_text:
### Black Myth: Wukong Buddha's Eyeball 5 Location
A little further on, on the left side of the area, you will see a covered area of the cave with some more Blazebones. This is before the Rockrest Flat Shrine. On your left, there will be a path curving up to another caved area.
img_below_text:
Continue up the hill and you will find the Mother of Stones boss. Either fight her, or leave her for later. Take a right where the light is shining through the cave at the top, and you will find the Buddha statue with the eyeball on the cliff edge.
Buddha's Eyeball 5

img_summary: The image depicts a dark, rocky cave environment illuminated by scattered fire pits, with a lone character holding a staff and standing in the foreground. This scene appears to be part of the journey toward locating Buddha's Eyeball 6 in *Black Myth: Wukong*. Based on the preceding and following text, the image likely represents the path leading up to the Mother of Stones boss encounter and the subsequent discovery of the Buddha statue with the eyeball on the cliff edge. It serves as a visual guide for players navigating this specific area.
